thread.title: Newswire: Pixies announce new North American tour dates with Mitski
thread.title_full: Newswire: Pixies announce new North American tour dates with Mitski

author: Katie Rife
title: Newswire: Pixies announce new North American tour dates with Mitski
text:
Photo: Venla Shalin / Getty Images Photo: Venla Shalin / Getty Images Share Tweet 
Last month, the Pixies announced that they’d be going back out onto the road for some more of that sweet reunited alt-rock pioneer cash, and also to support their new record Head Carrier. That run of tour dates extended from April through the end of May, and today the band announced a new batch of tour dates that will keep the eyeball-slicing fun going through the end of October. And if just seeing the Pixies isn’t incentive enough, the band will be joined by Mitski, who’s still touring in support of her excellent 2016 album Puberty 2 , on the majority of the newly added dates, with Sunflower Bean supporting on the rest. 
You can see the Pixies’ previously announced spring North American tour dates here , and the newly added dates with Mitski and Sunflower Bean below. Pre-sales for all shows have begun on the band’s website. Pre-sale on NOW for new dates https://t.co/ecTooIuXYR Password: Masher
